Class: PanEmitter

PanEmitter

new PanEmitter(element, options)

Class that emits or provides support for pan gestures/events.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
element Element element for which to monitor for pan gestures/events.
options Object <nullable>
 Additional options
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
horizontal boolean <optional>
<nullable>
 false Whether to monitor horizontal pan gestures.
vertical boolean <optional>
<nullable>
 true Whether to monitor vertical pan gestures.
threshold number <optional>
<nullable>
 0 Threshold distance before pan gestures are detected.
Source:
  • ui/panemitter.js, line 18
